name: Planto
description:
Welcome to my second game ever, Planto!

This is my submission for the Ludum Dare 46 Compo Game Jam. 

The theme was "Keep it Alive". Thus you must keep Planto alive by feeding him blood! OooOOoo scary! 

This game is far from perfect, but I learned a lot from it. You can't really beat the game, so think of it more as an open world game like Minecraft.
